page.title: 08SEDDON ESTATE, CHELFORD
page.content: Seddon Estate is an area of new expensive housing in Chelford close to the village and Peck Mill Farm. The building started eleven years ago and is expected to continue for another three years. The price range at present is Â£52000 to Â£87000. The houses are modern, spacious, detached houses of various designs with gardens.It is a friendly neighbourhood where most people know each other. There is a full time gardener for the estate. This is what we found out from the questionnaires we handed out. Most people have lived on the estate between one and two years. About half the people are new to the area and the others have come from nearby areas. Most people find the estate quiet and peaceful and love its position in the countryside.They all enjoy life there.
